Header.title: Create Game Entry
Header.description: Add a new game entry to Shionlib's database, using Visual Novel Database (VNDB) and Bangumi for basic authoritative information.
Header.descriptionPrefix: Add a new game entry to Shionlib's database, using
Header.guidePrefix: If you want to know how to search for games using VNDB, please refer to

Form.vndbIdDescription: The VNDB ID is a combination of letter v and digits, for example: v14018.
Form.bangumiIdDescription: The Bangumi ID is a combination of digits, for example: 88765.
Form.skipConsistencyCheckDescription: Skip consistency check, if skipped, will not check if the data from VNDB and Bangumi is consistent.

validation.vndbId: Please enter a valid VNDB ID
validation.bangumiId: Please enter a valid Bangumi ID

Create.invalidId: Invalid VNDB ID or Bangumi ID
Create.success: Created successfully, game entry ID is {id}
Create.successDescription: Click the button below to open the game entry page in a new window.

Alert.infoDescription: If you want to create a game entry that does not have a corresponding VNDB ID and Bangumi ID, please contact the administrator to manually add it.

errorCodes.400103: Bangumi request failed, possibly because the Bangumi ID does not exist or Bangumi is not accessible.
errorCodes.400104: VNDB request failed, possibly because the VNDB ID does not exist or VNDB is not accessible.
errorCodes.400105: The game entry already exists in Shionlib's database.
errorCodes.400106: The game data obtained from VNDB and Bangumi did not pass the consistency check, please check if the ID you filled is correct.
